# zitadel_action_execution_function (Data Source)

Datasource representing an action execution triggered by a function.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource. Must be one of: `preuserinfo`, `preaccesstoken`, `presamlresponse`

### Read-Only

- `name` (String) The name of the function.
- `target_ids` (List of String) The list of target IDs to call.
